errors.paymentInsufficientBalance: Insufficient balance. You only have {{ balance }} {{ tokenSymbol }} in your Ethereum wallet.
errors.paymentInvalid: Payment field cannot be left empty
errors.recipientInvalid: Please enter a valid Ethereum address
errors.stopTimeLowerThanStartTime: The stop time cannot be before the start time
errors.stopTimeInvalid: Stop time field cannot be left empty

input.rate: How much do you want to start paying?
input.recipient: What is the Ethereum address of the recipient?
input.times: When should the stream start and when should it end?
input.token: What token do you want to use?

installWeb3MobileBrowser: Please visit us from a web3-enabled mobile browser such as Trust Wallet or Coinbase Wallet.
installMetamask: Please visit us after installing Metamask on Chrome or Brave.

mailto.subject: Sablier App ‚è≥
mailto.body: I thought you might be interested in Sablier: a decentralized app for continuous payments on Ethereum. Check it out at https://beta.sablier.app!

mobileBan: Sablier is currently not available on mobile. Follow us on Twitter @SablierHQ to be the first to know when it will be available.

noWallet.desktop: Please visit us after installing Metamask on Chrome or Brave.
noWallet.mobile: Please visit us from a web3-enabled mobile browser such as Trust Wallet or Coinbase Wallet.
noWallet.title: No Ethereum wallet found

redeem.confirm: Are you sure? You will stop the stream and redeem the remaining {{ remaining }} {{ tokenSymbol }} to your Ethereum wallet. The recipient will only receive {{ paid }} {{ tokenSymbol }}, instead of the initial amount of {{ deposit }} {{ tokenSymbol }}.
redeem.success: You successfully redeemed {{ senderAmount }} {{ tokenSymbol }} to your Ethereum wallet.
redeem.warning: This stream was redeemed on {{ redemptionTime }}, which means that the payer withdrew a portion or all of their funds back to their Ethereum wallet. If the redemption occurred after the stream started, your funds were automatically withdrawn to your wallet. The exact amount is shown under "Earned".

shareTwitterText: Check out @SablierHQ for continuous payments on Ethereum üí∏

tokenApproval.confirm: This is the first time you're using Sablier with {{ tokenSymbol }}. You need to grant permission to interact with the tokens in your Ethereum wallet

tooltip.counterparty:
On Sablier, you can either be paid or pay.
When you are paid, there is a "From" label on
the left-hand side. Conversely, when you pay,
there is a "To" label.
tooltip.rate:
The rate at which the funds in the stream
are allocated. As time passes, the recipient
has the right to withdraw more money, while
the payer's share decreases. Any party can
terminate the stream at any time and funds will be
distributed proportionally at termination time.
tooltip.startTime:
The time when Sablier will start
paying the recipient using the funds deposited
by the payer.
tooltip.stopTime:
The time when Sablier will stop
paying the recipient using the funds deposited
by the payer.

withdraw.success: Ka-Ching! You successfully withdrew {{ amount }} {{ tokenSymbol }} to your Ethereum wallet.

wrongNetwork.title: Wrong Network
wrongNetwork.subtitle: You are connected to the wrong network. Please switch to the {{ networkName }}.
